General_Description: '''Bounty on a Merchant Ship''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for a [[merchant]] boat on a [[message board]]:
#"There's a merchant who is always loud and drunk. He's unbearable! [[Drachma]]e to the one who sinks the fool and brings some peace back to the port."
#"There's a merchant trying to make his goods sound better by lying about my wares. The ''malákas'' thinks I'm a fool! Destroy his [[ship]] and I'll reward you."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and sought out the merchant ship, sinking it and claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
